thread.title: Rick Owens Inspired a Couple’s Halloween Costume
thread.title_full: Rick Owens Inspired a Couple’s Halloween Costume -- The Cut

author: Véronique Hyland
title: Rick Owens Inspired a Couple’s Halloween Costume
text:
Photo: itmejaren/Twitter
If you're still looking around for that perfectly arcane fashion-themed costume for Halloween, put down those Choupette ears and think even more high-concept. One guy tweeted his Rick Owens costume, inspired by the spring 2016 show — you know, the one where the models wore other models.
The look is as simple as strapping an inflatable doll to a tr è s Owens leather ensemble. We predict a run on Ricky's "inflatables" aisle.
yooo @VFILES it me ☠ pic.twitter.com/tJjK0e2bvf
— Jaren Amoroso (@ItMeJaren) October 26, 2015
